SoMFPlane Class Reference
[Field classes]

#include <Inventor/fields/SoMFPlane.h>

Inheritance diagram for SoMFPlane:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The SoMFPlane class is a container for SbPlane values.

This field is used where nodes, engines or other field containers needs to store multiple 3D plane definitions.

See also:
SoSFPlane

void SoMFPlane::copyValue (  int  to,
int  from
)  [protected, virtual]
 

This method is used for moving values around internally within a multivalue field. It needs to be overridden in each field so it automatically takes care of running copy contructors where necessary.

Implements SoMField.
